name: Car Crash Sandbox
description:
Crash cars in this extreme car crash sandbox. Best car crash game and also known as Phun car destruction.

In this extreme car crashes sandbox game, you will play with a variety of cars and use them to race and reach the finish line. Watch as your car flies and enjoy the ultimate car crashes! This game has amazing car crash physics.


Complete levels by racing with your car and try to pass the crash car test. In this extreme car crash sandbox game, you will have different cars to race and watch them crash.

You need to race carefully as it is very easy to crash a car. It is a physics game with extreme car crash features.

One of the best car crash games!

Drive anything you want and watch them crash and destruct as your car crashes and breaks into tiny pieces. Try different techniques to drive a car and see how it crashes!
